>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.mu0emKq7UEsMFpWt]{Spell Sergeant}

You underwent basic training and have spent time in the field. You gain one of the following feats: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.54qpDSqRUsVRWOSZ]{Advanced Weapon Proficiency (Combat)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.UwmeR3lCfm936vxe]{Great Fortitude}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.zxBtaClmQw38z7LS]{Heavy Armor Proficiency (Combat)}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.L7RuZ5Mvv7knW70t]{Longarm Proficiency (Combat)}. At 7th level, you gain an additional bonus feat depending on your initial feat choice; if you chose Great Fortitude, you gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.gHFaGEQj42de9zmT]{Improved Great Fortitude}. If you chose Heavy Armor Proficiency, you gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.XFUghykvnCSVHJ9n]{Powered Armored Proficiency (Combat)}. If you chose Advanced Weapon Proficiency or Longarm Proficiency, you gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Ph3nPNKZtR2io3wi]{Versatile Specialization (Combat)}. If you already have one of these bonus feats, you can choose a different combat feat for which you qualify.
